title: For you madam. [No. 68/06] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Ferte Milon a charming little village on the outskirts of Paris; Ready-to-wear fashion parade of Autumn-Winter ‘68-69; Antique dealer and poet, Elise Paris; Christine Delaroche performs “I like them that way”. Full transcription inside film can.
